elements.name: question12
elements.title: Find the two main causes (= elements in the network) of the financing problem in the network.
elements.correctAnswer: Birth rates in Switzerland too low; rising life expectancy in Switzerland

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Now find the 3 elements in the network that can be essential parts of a solution to the financing problem. Tip: Two elements can be derived directly from the network. One element primarily reduces expenditure, but also increases income slightly. The people have already approved a change to this element in the fall of 2022.
elements.correctAnswer: Increase public contributions and/or social security contributions; increase retirement age.
